Text: Oh no!

*Gulp* \n Another!
What!?
I've got an idea.
Phew, all done. \n How'd you do Raven?
I'm one short, you win.

*Munch* *Munch* \n I'm just \n getting started!

Too bad.

Yep...

Move over, \n I'm hungry too!
Let's head out mining. \n You should bring your \n partner!
Raven?
She hasn't been out to \n the mines yet, right?
You know the rules: \n A lazy worker is \n a hungry worker.

And Raven's a very 
 hungry worker. She'll 
 wipe out your food 
 supplies.

Hey, you wanna go \n out on a mining trip \n with us?

Mining... Sure, \n I'll give it a try.
Sounds like a plan! \n Let's head out.
*Beep* *Beep*
Hey, you only need to \n mine one person's worth \n of ore, got it?
There's only two of you \n and she's new to mining, \n so don't go overboard.
Alright! Guess I'd \n better explain how this \n all works.

Raven, we have to find 
 the ore deposits and 
 break 'em to extract the 
 ore.
Grab the ore and you're \n done. That's all there \n is to it!

 what Raven does,

Okay, let's get started!

 keeping count, so I 
 don't know how

Say, Raven, how about a \n little competition this \n time?

And a little competition \n should help motivate us.
You have a point.
Of course, but \n don't strain yourself.
Taking it slow is \n important for extracting \n high-quality ore.

Alright, let's mine \n around here.

Nope, this time's \n for real!
Phew, how'd you do?
Not so hot.
O-Oh, I see. Don't let \n it get you down, you're \n still green at this.
Let's count your share. \n 1, 2, 3...
I-I lost by one! \n What did she mean \n by "not so hot"?
I thought I could do \n better. I should've \n tried taking it easier.

 couldn't we speed up the 
 mining process with a 
 special move?

 save a lot of time. 
 Seems like it could be 
 more efficient.

You look disappointed.
Well, it's just I have \n been at this longer.

You really don't get it, \n do you?
